1.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    cardsInBag = {}
    memoizedCards = {}
    cardJson = loadCards()
end

function onObjectEnterContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        --use previously-found cards for faster performace
        if memoizedCards[object.getName()] then
            table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName() .. memoizedCards[object.getName()], id = object.getGUID()})
            recreateButtons()
        else
            findCard(object)
        end
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        removeCardByGUID(cardsInBag, object.getGUID())
        recreateButtons()
    end
end

function findCard(object)
    local cost = ''

    for _, card in pairs (cardJson) do
        if (card.name == object.getName()) then
            if card.cost ~= nil then
                cost = '[' .. card.cost .. '] '
            end
            break
        end
    end

    --memoize result
    memoizedCards[object.getName()] = icons

    table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = cost .. object.getName(), id = object.getGUID()})
    recreateButtons()
end

function recreateButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    verticalPosition = 1.5

    for _, card in ipairs(cardsInBag) do
        if _G['removeCard' .. card.id] == nil then
            _G['removeCard' .. card.id] = function()
                removeCard(card.id)
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label = card.name,
            click_function = "removeCard" .. card.id,
            function_owner = self,
            position = {0,0,verticalPosition},
            height = 200,
            width = 1200,
            font_size = 75,
            color = {1,1,1},
            font_color = {0,0,0}
        })

        verticalPosition = verticalPosition - 0.5
    end

    countLabel = #cardsInBag == 0 and '' or #cardsInBag

    self.createButton({
        label = countLabel,
        click_function = 'nothing',
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,0,-1.25},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = 225,
        font_color = {1,1,1}
    })
end

function nothing()
end

function removeCard(cardGUID)
    self.takeObject({
        guid = cardGUID,
        rotation = self.getRotation(),
        position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,0.5,0),
        callback_function = function(obj)
            obj.resting = true
        end
    })
end

function removeCardByGUID(bag, guid)
    local idx = nil

    for i, v in ipairs (bag) do
        if (v.id == guid) then
          idx = i
        end
    end

    if idx ~= nil then
        table.remove(cardsInBag, idx)
    end
end

1.Name: Custom_Model_Bag

2.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    cardsInBag = {}
    memoizedCards = {}
    cardJson = loadCards()
end

function onObjectEnterContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        --use previously-found cards for faster performace
        if memoizedCards[object.getName()] then
            table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName() .. memoizedCards[object.getName()], id = object.getGUID()})
            recreateButtons()
        else
            findCard(object)
        end
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        removeCardByGUID(cardsInBag, object.getGUID())
        recreateButtons()
    end
end

function findCard(object)
    local icons = ''
    local cost = ''

    for _, card in pairs (cardJson) do
        if (card.name == object.getName()) then
            local skillIcons = getIcons(card.skillIcons)
            if skillIcons ~= '' then
                icons = '\n' .. skillIcons
            end
            if card.cost ~= nil then
                cost = '[' .. card.cost .. '] '
            end
            break
        end
    end

    --memoize result
    memoizedCards[object.getName()] = icons

    table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = cost .. object.getName() .. icons, id = object.getGUID()})
    recreateButtons()
end

function getIcons(skillIcons)
    local icons = ''

    for icon, value in pairs (skillIcons) do
        icons = icons .. icon .. ': ' .. value .. ' '
    end

    return icons
end

function recreateButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    verticalPosition = 1.5

    for _, card in ipairs(cardsInBag) do
        if _G['removeCard' .. card.id] == nil then
            _G['removeCard' .. card.id] = function()
                removeCard(card.id)
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label = card.name,
            click_function = "removeCard" .. card.id,
            function_owner = self,
            position = {0,0,verticalPosition},
            height = 225,
            width = 1200,
            font_size = 75,
            color = {1,1,1},
            font_color = {0,0,0}
        })

        verticalPosition = verticalPosition - 0.55
    end

    countLabel = #cardsInBag == 0 and '' or #cardsInBag

    self.createButton({
        label = countLabel,
        click_function = 'nothing',
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,0,-1.25},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = 225,
        font_color = {1,1,1}
    })
end

function nothing()
end

function removeCard(cardGUID)
    self.takeObject({
        guid = cardGUID,
        rotation = self.getRotation(),
        position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,0.5,0),
        callback_function = function(obj)
            obj.resting = true
        end
    })
end

function removeCardByGUID(bag, guid)
    local idx = nil

    for i, v in ipairs (bag) do
        if (v.id == guid) then
          idx = i
        end
    end

    if idx ~= nil then
        table.remove(cardsInBag, idx)
    end
end

2.Name: Custom_Model_Bag

function onload(saved_data) cardsInBag = {} memoizedCards = {} searchUrl="https://arkhamdb.com/find?q=" end function onObjectEnterContainer(container, object) if container == self then --use previously-found cards to prevent redundant ArkhamDB requests if memoizedCards[object.getName()] then table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName() .. memoizedCards[object.getName()], id = object.getGUID()}) recreateButtons() else local formatCardName = string.gsub(string.lower(object.getName()), ' ', '+') WebRequest.get(searchUrl .. formatCardName, function(req) searchCallback(req, object) end) end end end function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, object) if container == self then removeCardByGUID(cardsInBag, object.getGUID()) recreateButtons() end end function searchCallback(req, object) local traits = '' local traitsHtml = string.match(req.text, '

3.Name: Custom_Model_Bag

4.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    cardsInBag = {}
    memoizedCards = {}
    cardJson = loadCards()
end

function onObjectEnterContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        --use previously-found cards for faster performace
        if memoizedCards[object.getName()] then
            table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName() .. memoizedCards[object.getName()], id = object.getGUID()})
            recreateButtons()
        else
            findCard(object)
        end
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        removeCardByGUID(cardsInBag, object.getGUID())
        recreateButtons()
    end
end

function findCard(object)
    local icons = ''

    for _, card in pairs (cardJson) do
        if (card.name == object.getName()) then
            local skillIcons = getIcons(card.skillIcons)
            if skillIcons ~= '' then
                icons = '\n' .. skillIcons
            end
            break
        end
    end

    --memoize result
    memoizedCards[object.getName()] = icons

    table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName() .. icons, id = object.getGUID()})
    recreateButtons()
end

function getIcons(skillIcons)
    local icons = ''

    for icon, value in pairs (skillIcons) do
        icons = icons .. icon .. ': ' .. value .. ' '
    end

    return icons
end

function recreateButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    verticalPosition = 1.5

    for _, card in ipairs(cardsInBag) do
        if _G['removeCard' .. card.id] == nil then
            _G['removeCard' .. card.id] = function()
                removeCard(card.id)
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label = card.name,
            icon = 'combatIcon',
            click_function = "removeCard" .. card.id,
            function_owner = self,
            position = {0,0,verticalPosition},
            height = 225,
            width = 1200,
            font_size = 75,
            color = {1,1,1},
            font_color = {0,0,0}
        })

        verticalPosition = verticalPosition - 0.5
    end

    countLabel = #cardsInBag == 0 and '' or #cardsInBag

    self.createButton({
        label = countLabel,
        click_function = 'nothing',
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,0,-1.25},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = 225,
        font_color = {1,1,1}
    })
end

function nothing()
end

function removeCard(cardGUID)
    self.takeObject({
        guid = cardGUID,
        rotation = self.getRotation(),
        position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,0.5,0),
        callback_function = function(obj)
            obj.resting = true
        end
    })
end

function removeCardByGUID(bag, guid)
    local idx = nil

    for i, v in ipairs (bag) do
        if (v.id == guid) then
          idx = i
        end
    end

    if idx ~= nil then
        table.remove(cardsInBag, idx)
    end
end

4.Name: Custom_Model_Bag

5.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    cardsInBag = {}
    skillCards = {}
    skillCount = 0
    cardJson = loadCards()
end

function onObjectEnterContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        if object.type == 'Card' then
            table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName(), id = object.getGUID()})
            recreateButtons()
        elseif object.type == 'Deck' and #cardsInBag == 0 then
            scanDeck(object)
        end
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        removeCardByGUID(cardsInBag, object.getGUID())
        recreateButtons()
    end
end

function scanDeck(object)
    for _, containedObject in ipairs(object.getObjects()) do
        for _, card in pairs (cardJson) do
            if card.name == containedObject.name and card.type == 'skill' then
                skillCount = skillCount + 1
                table.insert(skillCards, {name = containedObject.name, id = containedObject.guid})
                break
            end
        end
    end

    if skillCount >= 10 then
        init(object)
    else
        broadcastToAll('Not enough skill cards in deck', Table)

        self.takeObject({
            guid = object.getGUID(),
            rotation = self.getRotation(),
            position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,0.5,0),
            callback_function = function(obj)
                obj.resting = true
            end
        })
    end
end

function init(object)
    local randomSkills = {table.unpack(FYShuffle(skillCards), 1, 5)}
    height = 1

    self.takeObject({
        guid = object.getGUID(),
        rotation = self.getRotation(),
        position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,0,-2.5),
        callback_function = function(obj)
            for _, skillCards in ipairs (randomSkills) do
                obj.takeObject({
                    guid = skillCards.id,
                    rotation = self.getRotation(),
                    position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,height,0)
                })

                height = height + 0.5
            end
        end
    })
end

function FYShuffle(tInput)
    local tReturn = {}
    math.randomseed(os.time())

    for i = #tInput, 1, -1 do
        local j = math.random(i)
        tInput[i], tInput[j] = tInput[j], tInput[i]
        table.insert(tReturn, tInput[i])
    end

    return tReturn
end

function recreateButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    verticalPosition = 1.5

    for _, card in ipairs(cardsInBag) do
        if _G['removeCard' .. card.id] == nil then
            _G['removeCard' .. card.id] = function()
                removeCard(card.id)
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label = card.name,
            click_function = "removeCard" .. card.id,
            function_owner = self,
            position = {0,0,verticalPosition},
            height = 200,
            width = 1200,
            font_size = 75,
            color = {1,1,1},
            font_color = {0,0,0}
        })

        verticalPosition = verticalPosition - 0.5
    end

    countLabel = #cardsInBag == 0 and '' or #cardsInBag

    self.createButton({
        label = countLabel,
        click_function = 'nothing',
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,0,-1.25},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = 225,
        font_color = {1,1,1}
    })
end

function nothing()
end

function removeCard(cardGUID)
    self.takeObject({
        guid = cardGUID,
        rotation = self.getRotation(),
        position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,0.5,0),
        callback_function = function(obj)
            obj.resting = true
        end
    })
end

function removeCardByGUID(bag, guid)
    local idx = nil

    for i, v in ipairs (bag) do
        if (v.id == guid) then
          idx = i
        end
    end

    if idx ~= nil then
        table.remove(cardsInBag, idx)
    end
end

5.Name: Custom_Model_Bag

6.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    cardsInBag = {}
    memoizedCards = {}
    cardJson = loadCards()
end

function onObjectEnterContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        --use previously-found cards for faster performace
        if memoizedCards[object.getName()] then
            table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName() .. memoizedCards[object.getName()], id = object.getGUID()})
            recreateButtons()
        else
            findCard(object)
        end
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, object)
    if container == self then
        removeCardByGUID(cardsInBag, object.getGUID())
        recreateButtons()
    end
end

function findCard(object)
    local icons = ''

    for _, card in pairs (cardJson) do
        if (card.name == object.getName()) then
            local skillIcons = getIcons(card.skillIcons)
            if skillIcons ~= '' then
                icons = '\n' .. skillIcons
            end
            break
        end
    end

    --memoize result
    memoizedCards[object.getName()] = icons

    table.insert(cardsInBag, {name = object.getName() .. icons, id = object.getGUID()})
    recreateButtons()
end

function getIcons(skillIcons)
    local icons = ''

    for icon, value in pairs (skillIcons) do
        icons = icons .. icon .. ': ' .. value .. ' '
    end

    return icons
end

function recreateButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    verticalPosition = 1.5

    for _, card in ipairs(cardsInBag) do
        if _G['removeCard' .. card.id] == nil then
            _G['removeCard' .. card.id] = function()
                removeCard(card.id)
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label = card.name,
            icon = 'combatIcon',
            click_function = "removeCard" .. card.id,
            function_owner = self,
            position = {0,0,verticalPosition},
            height = 225,
            width = 1200,
            font_size = 75,
            color = {1,1,1},
            font_color = {0,0,0}
        })

        verticalPosition = verticalPosition - 0.5
    end

    countLabel = #cardsInBag == 0 and '' or #cardsInBag

    self.createButton({
        label = countLabel,
        click_function = 'nothing',
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,0,-1.25},
        width = 0,
        height = 0,
        font_size = 225,
        font_color = {1,1,1}
    })
end

function nothing()
end

function removeCard(cardGUID)
    self.takeObject({
        guid = cardGUID,
        rotation = self.getRotation(),
        position = self.getPosition() + Vector(0,0.5,0),
        callback_function = function(obj)
            obj.resting = true
        end
    })
end

function removeCardByGUID(bag, guid)
    local idx = nil

    for i, v in ipairs (bag) do
        if (v.id == guid) then
          idx = i
        end
    end

    if idx ~= nil then
        table.remove(cardsInBag, idx)
    end
end
